reviews.review: Отличная игра
я чай с лимоном пью, а вы?

Oyun tek kelimeyle mükemmel. Oyunun tek oyunculu hikayesini sanırım 4 kere bitirdim ve hiç sıkılmadım çünkü oyunun mizahı gerçekten her oynayışınızda güldürüyor ve çok uzatmadan oyun bitiyor. Çok az sistem istediği içinde benim bilgisayarımın olmadığı zamanlarda oyun ihtiyacımı güzelce karşılamıştı. Bulmacaların bazıları çok beyin yorabiliyor ama eninde sonunda bulunuyor ve "Gerçekten bunu mu akıl edememişim" diyosunuz. Eğer arkadaşlarınızda da varsa zaten o zaman tadından yenmiyor. Oyunun birde tek oyunculu hikayesinden sonrasını anlatan Coop hikaye modu var. Arkadaşlarınızla birlikte oynayınca çok eğlenceli oluyor. Fiyatı tamamen uygun, hiçbir şekilde borsa dan da etkilenmiyor. İndirimlere 3 buçuk tl ye bile düşüyor. Atölye de topluluğun yaptığı testleri oyunda açabiliyorsun. Aynı şekilde oyun içinden sizde kendi test odanızı yapıp toplulukta paylaşabiliyorsunuz. Kesinlikle sonuna kadar oyunu öneririm. Alın hiçbir şey kaybetmezsiniz
игра имба

7.7小时通关，看了很多攻略，这代关卡设计比1代复杂了实在太多了，我脑子不太够用，谜题设计的都很有意思不过很容易就会感觉到疲惫，因为如果一卡关不看攻略都是15分钟20分钟的卡关很煎熬，不过2代升级挺大，无论是各种新新系统和画面，G姐唱歌还是那么的好听，结尾扔出来一个爱心方块绝对只有玩过一代的老粉才知道了吧，剧情我还是看不懂，不过这代的幽默依然在，我去看一下剧情解析，总而言之，传送门系列在解密的交互方式与逻辑上真的很棒，解密游戏界绝对的第一梯队！

What can I say that thousands haven't say yet? It's amazing, it's Portal, I'll always want more. I dream of the day when the black screen at the start of a mysterytrailer lasts a little longer than it should, and suddenly Glados's voices comes over, offering us cake yet again.
amazing yes

Incredible game. Truly one of the best games on steam. GlaDOS and Wheatley are absolutely hilarious. Choosing which is better is a tough assignment. And the puzzles are really well done too. I had a tough time picturing how they would innovate on the previous game, and they succeeded. The only part of the game I didn't like was chapter 6 and 7. Without saying any spoilers, they were in very large, open rooms, and a lot of the difficulty I had was finding a hidden small segment of wall to portal to. The puzzles in those two chapters were a bit weird, although the new puzzle mechanic in those chapters was awesome. Those two chapters also contain a lot of lore, but the plot for those chapters was a bit hard to follow. 

Anyway awesome game, one of the best on steam. Buy it! Wait for a sale if you're unsure.

Edit: just finished the game. I'd give it a 9 out of 10. The game dragged on a bit long imo. But seriously, two of the funniest characters ever, the puzzles were mostly great, and the ending is amazing. I can't wait to play coop.

Even better than the 1st, which was a hard act to follow.
Why is there no Portal 3 in the works?

This is one of my favourite games. I'm not really sure why, but everything about it just seems so amazing. The soundtrack is brilliant, the gameplay is fun, I really enjoyed the story, and something about the environments all the way throughout the game just feels amazing. I don't know how to describe it, I don't feel I'm doing the game justice, but it's just great.
